title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, goals, constraints, and use cases for BuilderAgents. Identify the key stakeholders and their expectations. Define the project's scope, deliverables, and success criteria. Outline the high-level architecture, the roles of the specialized AI agents, and their interrelationships in achieving the project objectives. Ensure that the requirements are clear, measurable, and aligned with the project's objectives.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the different AI agents, their roles, interactions, and communication protocols. Define the high-level components, data flow, and integration points. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, security aspects, and agent coordination mechanisms. Specify the technologies and frameworks to be used for agent development, communication, and deployment. Additionally, include performance optimization strategies and detailed architecture diagrams for better understanding. For this task, I suggest focusing on implementing a microservices-based architecture to allow for independent scaling of each AI agent and improve overall system resilience.

title: Decompose Project into Tasks
description: Break down the project into smaller, manageable tasks and subtasks.

title: Implement AI Agents
description: Develop the various AI agents with their respective functionalities.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for interacting with the AI agents.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database and data storage solutions for the project.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to ensure data privacy and system integrity.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure and implement continuous integration and deployment processes.

title: Test and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for the AI agents and the overall system.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Storage
Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the BuilderAgents system.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Storage
Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
